name: MusicalFun
0:
”Alexa, ask musical fun to play a game.”
”Alexa, open musical fun”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: musical fun
des: The skill will play different musical instruments and you should guess the name of instrument. If you guess it right, it will move to next one, otherwise it will ask if you would like to hear it again. You can skip a question by saying Next.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
